name: Simple Steam Enhancements
description: Lightweight style that will set Motiva Sans as the sitewide font, plus other small enhancements.

user.name: Gaige
user.about: Coding is my hobby. Hit me up on Steam if any of my styles are broken.

additional_info:
This is what my style will change:

- Motiva Sans will no longer be exclusive to the Store, it'll be the sitewide font
- Wallet balance will be more readable now
- Steam Achievements and Steam Trading Cards will be highlighted features in every store page
- The "Current players" numbers will have a narrower font, fixing overlapping in incredibly popular games like CS:GO or Dota 2

10 dec 2015
- NEW: small additions for Enhanced Steam users
- FIXED: base font not showing properly on some parts of Steam

26 apr 2015
- FIXED: group announcements should be in Motiva Sans now
